Considering the attacks peo=
ple continue to make against  me on here just 
for having a different opini=
on of people's results, I  think you will 
understand why I will not post m=
y name and address  here.

Try anyway though.  I don't know how your person=
al  beliefs here work, but 
others seem to get messages about people they'v=
e  never heard of, or places 
they've never seen.

I would also  suggest an=
yone who tries this experiment, to post your 
results on the  list here rat=
her than sending them personally to me - so I won't 
be  accused of losing =
any.

bably tons of

ound the world a

In a message dated 7/10/2010 3:32:=
51 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have pla=
ced a little something on top of my computer  monitor, right in 
front of m=
e. It is now 7/10/2010. I will leave it  there 4 days, and remove 
it Noon =
Denver time, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.

All you have to do is ask your boxe=
s/spirits/  aliens/etc, what it is.

I have taken a picture of it, and  pos=
ted it to the files section here, so 
there is no way I can squirm  out of =
the results:

_http://tech. groups.yahoo. com/group/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.=
20100710.

Please do not try to  open the file before noon Wednesday.=
 But feel free to 
download it to  your computer beforehand, so you can be =
sure I won't change 
it  during, or after, the test.

Answers anyone reveal=
s after noon  Wednesday don't count. Partial answers 
(like just the color,=
 or  shape, or some emotion vibe) don't count. Just tell 
me what it  is.

=
Best of Luck. I hope for this to be a regularly occurring  experiment, and =

I hope we all can learn from the results.
